column4: Okay, here is my plan. I have Ubuntu 8.04 installed right now, and I am planning to install Windows XP. What should I do to make sure GRUB will still work?
Okay, here is my plan. I have Ubuntu 8.04 installed right now, and I am planning to install Windows XP. What should I do to make sure GRUB will still work?
Can someone please tell me what (if any) precautions needed to install XP on a Ubuntu machine?
you need at least a way to reconfigure grub ;) more i cannot tell since i never tried
